en.description:
Akademija za jezik, govor i tekst (abbreviated Akademija d.o.o.)
is a language and translation center whose high-quality language programs
are based on individual language requirements of their clients, in accordance
with the Common European Framework of Reference for Languages (CEFR).
en.academy-made: Akademija is a highly competent team of teachers, specialists and translators who:
en.trans-1: from foreign languages into Croatian language
en.trans-2: from Croatian language into foreign languages
en.trans-3: from one foreign language into another foreign language
en.trans-5: editing of texts in Croatian language
en.course-1: regular general language programs
en.course-2: regular business language programs
en.course-3: specialized professional language programs
en.course-4: intensive business communication skills programs
en.testing-1: foreign language competence testing for private and professional purposes
en.faq-elab: Have a different question and can't find the answer you're looking for? <button id='to-contact' onclick='scrollToBottom()'>Contact us</button> by e-mail or phone and we'll gladly help you!
en.programs-li3: Language programs are compatible with the Common European Framework of Reference for Languages (CEFR), with foreign-language competence evaluated with following descriptive grades (descriptors). Download the program table by levels in PDF format.

hr.description:
Akademija za jezik, govor i tekst (skraćeno Akademija d.o.o.)
jezični je i prevoditeljski centar koji svoje visoko kvalitetne jezične programe
temelji na jezičnim potrebama individualnih klijenata, a u skladu s Europskom jezičnom mapom.
hr.academy-made: Akademiju čini vrstan tim profesora, stručnjaka i prevoditelja koji:
hr.trans-1: stranih jezika na hrvatski
hr.trans-2: s hrvatskog na strane jezike
hr.trans-3: sa stranog na drugi strani jezik
hr.trans-5: lektoriranje tekstova na hrvatskom jeziku
hr.course-1: redovni programi općeg jezika
hr.course-2: redovni programi poslovnog jezika
hr.course-3: specijalizirani programi jezika struke
hr.course-4: intenzivni programi poslovnih komunikacijskih vještina
hr.testing-1: testiranje znanja stranih jezika kandidata za osobne i potrebe poslodavca
hr.faq-elab: Imate drugih pitanja i ne možete pronaći odgovor? <button id="to-contact" onclick="scrollToBottom()">Kontaktirajte nas</button> preko e-maila ili telefona i rado ćemo vam pomoći!
hr.programs-li3: Jezični programi usklađeni su s Europskom jezičnom mapom (CEFR), a razine kompetencija na stranom jeziku izražene su deskriptorima kako slijedi. Preuzmite tablicu programa po stupnjevima u PDF formatu.
